EmailTemplate.description: Sent to participants of Integrity Selling Outside of Onboarding
EmailTemplate.name: Integrity Selling Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback Requested | Integrity Selling Course
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your Feedback Is Important!
We hope you enjoyed the Integrity Selling Course. It is our goal to ensure the Global Sales Training Team delivers world class training programs.
In order to continue to improve our programs and meet the needs of our growing sales force, we are asking you to answer a brief survey based on your experience.
Please follow the following link to complete the survey: https://wex.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_7OJeJt7BxsEytKd
Please email me with any questions.
Thank you,
The Global Sales Training Team
